website_summaries.verdict: This natural beard balm is an ideal choice for those who want to go beyond style control and address other issues of beard ownership, such as dry skin, beardruff, rogue hairs and beard itch.
pros: Creates a natural shine without heaviness
Good for controlling beardruff and beard itch
Leave-in conditioning formula keeps beard manageable all day
Also addresses split end issues for both men and women
cons: Some product separation reported on arrival

customer_reviews.title: Makes a healthy, good looking beard.
customer_reviews.text: This beard balm will leave your beard feeling healthy, happy and full. Product smells great and moisturizes beyond belief; your beard will be softer than ever. Watch the video for a quick review.
customer_reviews.author: One&Done

customer_reviews.title: Is this how its supposed to look?
customer_reviews.text: Is this how its supposed to look? After reading all good reviews i was excited to receive mine but then i received this. It looked like a porridge. Tried it hoping it'll work but then it looked like i slurped a mug of oil dripping unto my beard.
customer_reviews.author: bbseal

customer_reviews.title: Honest Amish beard balm is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: The honest Amish beard balm smells really good. It left my beard really shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my beard manageable and brings out a deeper color
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Keeps my beard manageable and brings out a deeper color.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest A. O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Pefect to maintain a full beard.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Honest Amish beard oil and balm for the past 5 months and have nothing but praises to give. on a daily basis I am complimented due to my beard being maintained. every time i give you guys the full credit. I will continue to use daily and appreciate the natural non overwhelming smells that are in this product and not overly potent unlike other brands.
customer_reviews.author: chris dalton

customer_reviews.title: Too all bearded men!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. Keeps your beard looking glorious!
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad A.

customer_reviews.title: Second time user and never again
customer_reviews.text: This was the second time ordering and maybe something wrong with this batch or not, but it was a separated liquified mess when I opened the can. Even put in freezer, it solidified, and after an hour or so it was back to the mess.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Assuming it's a bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I've ised Honest Amish before and didn't have an issue so I'm assuming I got a bad batch perhaps. This is my third time ordering their product and it's the only one like this.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Can’t take the heat
customer_reviews.text: Can’t travel with this product. Quickly turns to liquid exposed to any heat. Got everywhere in my bag and ruined my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Bdub

customer_reviews.title: Smells Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this balm along with the oil (from Honest Amish), I would NOT buy this again! This balm (and oil) smells super strong. I don't know how to describe the scent, but I'd rather smell like B.O. along with dirty socks than wear this balm again! From reading the other reviews, I think I may have gotten a bad batch because other people describe the scent as smelling of "black licorice and wood". Also, the ingredients were separated when I received the order. I'm thinking of contacting Amazon and asking for my money back being as these items (the balm and the oil) aren't returnable for hygiene reasons (which is understandable).
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this beard balm! I don't know why I'm just now putting in a review but I've been using this for about three years and it's amazing! I like to put a little bit more than normal on especially when it's sunny because it glistens in the sun!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: My Beard Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I use argan oil for my beard growth and overall healthiness of my beard. But it felt like I was missing something but didn't know what it was. I start youtubing and noticed these barbers used balm to further soften the beards. So I came across Honest Amish Beard Balm and never looked back ever since. PROS: * Adds a lovely shine to my beard. * Soften the texture or my beard that a comb can go straight through without pulling hairs. * Goes on very smoothly like butter. * Takes a dime sized amount for full beard coverage. CONS: * Container is very small so you have to be frugal in usage.
customer_reviews.author: Karanta

customer_reviews.title: It smells kind of gross
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this stuff has been driving me crazy.. In the tin it smells almost like chapstick.. When im wearing it on my beard It smells like a lubricated condom. I have been trying to pinpoint the smell and I finally did. I cant use this anymore... The smell is not tolerable. Aside from the smell, it makes my face feel greasy and heavy and pretty uncomfortable. Ive used it for 4 times so far and I have not noticed any differences in beard other than smell and grease... Others seem to like it - its not for me I guess...
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Buy this. Keep your wife happy. Keep your beard.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a formidable beard. This stuff helps. It smells nice, like lemon and herbs. It helps him tame the weird things that happen when he sleeps. Keeps it reasonably soft, even though his beard hair is super coarse.
customer_reviews.author: WFHMomma

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before & I liked it but when I re-ordered a second can, the first picture was what I saw upon opening the can. So I processed a return order to Amazon & opted to try it again & today upon its arrival I opened the can & the result is the second picture. I know it’s not supposed to be beady or liquidy, but more of a wax type. I’m really disappointed and quite honestly I am giving up on this brand completely.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this beard balm for my husband. It is a small metal container that can fit in the palm of you hand. I thought since it was so small it would run out quickly. I was so wrong. This container lasted my husband almost two months and he puts it on every single day. My husband & I husband love this beard balm. Before he began using this his beard was very rough and often he would get dry skin under it. Now it stay moisturized, soft and smells so good. We will be long term customers of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: This was a great started set. Really helped me understand how to take care of my new beard. This gives more of a shine than I would like and since it is balm based the hairs stick together. I think this would be great for a full thick beard but since I have patches and is barely growing it really does not help in hiding the patches since it likes to stick hairs together and you can really see the gaps. I still recommend this, but I would not recommend it for a starting beard. The smell people tell me is like a Vaseline scent (however I do not smell it when I use it).
customer_reviews.author: jbatman

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I think it smells bad and I’ve been using it for two weeks and my beards not any softer unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Believed the hype on this product and was extremely disappointed. The product arrived with a grits consistency but I figured maybe it would fix itself. Tried to apply and had to work extremely hard to get little white balls to break down. The scent is very off putting and smells similar to latex gloves. Will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Butler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Scent!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first time beard grower, so I don't have a lot of experience with other brands and products, but I'm very happy that I chose Honest Amish. My mustache was very coarse compared to my beard, but a couple weeks of this leave in conditioner softened it right up, plus it just smells amazing! As my beard grew longer, I needed a bit more hold, so I also purchased their beard wax, which smells exactly the same. Now I apply the beard wax to style, and just a little bit of beard balm for a nice shine and extra smells.
customer_reviews.author: der Bär

customer_reviews.title: Meh, Whatever
customer_reviews.text: First time buyer of this type of product at all, first off the scent was not for me --- kind of smelled like black licorice which i abhor. Next I didnt notice any conditioning quality of the product, nor did i notice any increased ability for styling. Not that I was going for a nice Mr Monopoly stache or anything just to tame some of those strays.... Lastly after using I got some acne on my face --- could be just coincidence but I rarely got acne before... The other thing I thought it would help with is beard itch which it did not... So I personally was not a fan of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Size is somewhat atypically small for the price
customer_reviews.text: I want to stress that I have not used the product yet, so no praise or criticism on that front, but the package size is disappointing and somewhat non standard from what other companies offer in your local pharmacy store. On the right is this product, that I paid $11.43 for. On the left is a much larger competitive product that I paid almost the exact same amount for at my local pharmacy store. I’m doubting that this product will be twice as good, as it’s a pretty simple product with little room for value enhancement, but I might be wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rettich

customer_reviews.title: Great for beards AND hands/knuckles
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used another product, but this immediately made a difference in my beard and as an unexpected benefit, is amazing on rough hands and knuckles! I think it takes 2 days to “soak in”, so you need to leave it alone or you’ll get residue on your fingers. Just comb it through every now and then. Great stuff, I’ll order more ahead, maybe try different scents if they offer them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey C. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Best beard balm I've used.
customer_reviews.text: I've used a few other products, and this one is my favorite. I noted the other products I used contained alcohol and other ingredients along with the natural oils. This one does not, and I really think my beard is softer and more tame because of it. My wife likes it because it's not as scratchy as it was. It also has a very nice, but barely noticeable scent.
customer_reviews.author: william dennis

customer_reviews.title: Good, non-greasy beard balmzee
customer_reviews.text: Hardest part of finding a beard balm I liked was finding one which had a scent my wife and kids enjoy; and, Honest Amish beard balm is that product. I have moderately coarse and dry hair; after a hot shower, I apply about a dime sized amount to my dry/damp beard. Too much will make my hair too shiny, but the correct amount leaves it soft and manageable. I use the Heavy Duty during the day and the regular hold for night.
customer_reviews.author: HIM916

customer_reviews.title: Now I understand the name
customer_reviews.text: Everything is fine about this product except one thing: it smells like damp straw. I guess that's the tie-in to the Amish. A day or two into using it, I asked my wife if my shirt smelled like straw. At this affront to her laundering skills, she took a sniff, then gave my whiskers a try and said, "It's your BEARD that smells like straw." Meh, I've smelled worse things, although I'd advise not working any into your moustache before going out to dinner. Kinda ruins the meal.
customer_reviews.author: Daven60

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my beard in check and skin hydrated
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this beard balm because I noticed that the skin under my beard was getting super dry and itchy. I started using this balm and it has been great! My skin no longer feels dry and itchy after I shower, and it keeps my beard looking nice and neat with very few stray hairs. The balm is easy to work into your beard with your hands, but to get better coverage you'll want to use a beard brush to evenly work in the balm. I was also worried about using this balm because I have acne-prone skin around my mouth and chin. I've been using this daily for a little over a month with no breakouts!
customer_reviews.author: RobPlease

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a handful of beard oils and balms after I decided to grow out my beard. For the money you cannot beat this product. I prefer a high end beard oil, it just works best for me - however this balm comes in a close second. It has a little bit of a wax smell, but it dissipates quickly. If you apply too much product it will leave your beard looking greasy. However, if you can find the perfect amount it will hydrate and hold down straggling beard hairs. The application of this balm is a art, but for the money you cannot beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Can't give this more than 3 stars. I've been using it for a couple months and my beard may be a little softer, but not as much as expected. The product is a "balm" but more like a wax than cream, so it really doesn't moisturize your skin very much since it's all stuck in your beard, even if applied to a wet beard as directed. If that's all you need/expect then you'll probably be satisfied. Note: it also smells/tastes a bit like black licorice, which my wife likes but yours may not...
customer_reviews.author: Keith T.

customer_reviews.title: must have if you have a beard
customer_reviews.text: Best beard product I have used. I have tried 15+ other brands and product types and this makes my beard feel the sofestest without leaving it oily. It is also a great consistency as it is not to heavy or to runny. I will use this for as long as I have a beard. My girlfriend uses it on her hair too and she seems to really like it too. She buys a lot of hair product aimed at women but she has been using this over her other stuff. The smell is pleasant but not strong at all which to me is a huge plus. Most other products are way to perfumed.
customer_reviews.author: Juturna

customer_reviews.title: Some will say it has a wonderful aroma. I wanted a beard softener that my ...
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, it smells. Some will say it stinks. Some will say it has a wonderful aroma. I wanted a beard softener that my girlfriend (with a delicate nose) would accept. This isn't it. So far, it seems to be good at taming my wild facial hair, but I don't like the aroma I carry around with it. Update: I left this stuff open for several months in an empty room hoping the odor would leave. It was reduced, but I tried applying it today, and it STILL smells in my beard. Even after thoroughly washing my beard, I can still smell it. Some folk will like the odor. I can't stand it. I just tossed it in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: A longtime buyer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people, men included, asked me what I put in my beard to keep it looking so good and soft. THIS was the secret "sauce"! I also use Reuzel Beard foam to help condition the skin underneath the beard to prevent beard dandruff. I also use shampoo and conditioner when showering too. You don't need much, if it's to shiny that's an indicator that you may have used a touch too much.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Love this beard balm!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews with the man in my life. He was looking for a good beard balm. Many of the reviews stated that the anise scent was bad, I was a little worried, but we ordered it to try it. He absolutely loves it!! Excellent product. Liked it so much , I ordered a second one!! The scent that I was so worried about... very lightly scented. I am not a fan of anise, but the scent was barely noticeable. And after an hour there wasn’t any odor at all!! He says it’s amazing, and he is VERY particular about his beard!! You should give this product a try, you will not be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this beard oil daily for over two years now and it is by far the very best on the market. It adds lister and shine without looking greasy/oily. It also conditions my beard to keep it soft and fluffy. I put it in right after a shower, I pat my beard dry and then lather it in. The only issue I have is that my beard is now rather long and when I wear dress shirts the oil stains the collars.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Just makes it greasy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product when my wife complained my beard was bristly and didn't want to kiss me anymore. I hoped it would soften the hair. It did nothing except make my facial hair greasy. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G.

customer_reviews.title: Careful Opening If Weather Is On The Hot Side
customer_reviews.text: Excited to try this product, so full review of the benefits of the product is "pending" Got my HABB delivered promptly, rush to open the lid, and splaaaat, like motor oil, it spilled everwhere (insert sad face here). I mopped up as much as possible with my hands and smothered on my beard, head, face, shoulders, arms, neck, chest, shoes, doorknobs, kitchen faucet etc.. The house smelled pretty good there for a while ! Not sure I have enough left to give this product a true time tested review, and deciding on sticking with HABB, or giving another brand a shot. One thing for sure, be veeery careful twisting the lid off in warmer weather !
customer_reviews.author: True Review

customer_reviews.title: Liquified in heat.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: UP TO 4 STARS FROM TWO. After a few hours in the refrigerator it did solidify pretty well and I had no problem with the smell or anyting. Goes on good **Excited to try this. Got my can today Aug 5. Went straight to bathroom and opened it. Liquid sloshed out everywhere. It smells good and I rubbed some into my beard. Spilled about 20%. I have put it in the fridge to see if it will solidify. Btw bought another balm to compare that came in same PKG and it was soft but good. Wondering if the Honest Amish ingredients will separate or blend back together. Won't order another if it can't take the heat of my mailbox.
customer_reviews.author: D. Beirne

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft Beard with this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This product really leaves your beard feeling soft. The smell is noticable, but not bad and I can see why people say it smells a bit like licorice. The product is a bit oily and if you touch your beard at all after applying you can feel it on your hand. It does a good job of rubbing into your skin though and isnt so oily that you feel like you need to wash your hands. The balm doesn't quite seem to have the hold I would prefer and it really isn't meant to have much hold. I may try the wax once this can runs out and see if that suits m preference.
customer_reviews.author: Jape

customer_reviews.title: Very oily / runny
customer_reviews.text: I used the product several times. What I don't like about it is that it doesn't keep your hairs in order. The product might not be made for that though. The real downside is that anything your touch with your beard will be oily (phone / hand / lady you just greeted). Therefore its better be used as a night time conditioner than a day time product. Also it'll make your beard shine - A LOT. Its a matter of taste I guess, but its not my taste. Wouldn't recommend not buying it if you like it that way. Definitely moisturized my beard, but other palms do that as well without being so runny.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first try at using a beard butter. I have had a beard for over 25 years and usually during the winter I get dandruff from dry skin. But using this has somehow kept my skin hydrated and has eliminated the dandruff and kept the hair softer and more controlled. It has a very subtle pleasant smell. Not overpowering at all or flower like. I'm very pleased with the product, and for the price, you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: droc42

customer_reviews.title: Not a strong holding wax, but keeps beard noticeably soft
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Don't be confused, this isn't so much a "holding wax" as it is beard conditioner. It somewhat keeps stray hairs at bay, but it's mostly to make your beard soft, not to hold it all day. Very pleasant smell—I legitimately get compliments daily (not to mention it smells nice on my upper lip). Easy to put on (just dig a dollop out with the back of your thumbnail). Does melt fairly easily in warm temperatures! Which isn't a huge deal, since the goal is to work it up into an oil/liquid anyway, it's just easier to spill that way. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.A.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: My beard has always felt dry and itchy but this stuff is god-sent. Some background info on my beard is that I keep it trimmed using a #2 or #3 guard. This product has made my beard feel amazing and it adds a nice shine to it that noticeable on those sunny days. I had no troubles with shipping as others have experienced such as those that live in Arizona. I think one step this company should take it creating a better case that won't allow it to melt. Other than that I'll be a lifelong customer.
customer_reviews.author: Simran T.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Product. A nice, soft, subtle smell, which I like as I am highly allergic to fragrances and this one does not bother my allergies at all. I applied it to my husbands beard (he resides in a nursing home and cannot groom himself) and it made his beard soft and manageable. It is gentle on the hands as well. I then used a beard comb and the salve helped to collect loose hairs that may have otherwise fallen onto him and irritated him. So, to me, this has a dual purpose. Anyway, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: FEC

customer_reviews.title: It's decent.
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this product, but, unfortunately, I can't. I've used a few beard balms in the past, and this one is my least favorite. Not sure if I received a bad batch, but when it arrived, it was completely liquefied (Not an issue). But, after storing it somewhere cool, it was a little more solid but still completely oily and in a liquid state. It did make it easier to apply to my beard, but it would only keep it moisturized for two hours at most. It did give my beard a great shine though, and I love the woodsy scent to it.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri Young

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas and this stuff is awesome. He has a really long beard. Prior to using this he had a lot of breakage and his beard was somewhat wild looking and not in a good way. Since he's been using this, the breakage his decreased dramatically and now he has very good beard days. :) I also bought the oil and he puts that on in the evening. He's not one who cares about grooming but he is using this stuff and I can definitely see a difference. I know I'm loving the difference!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Only slightly better than using a high quality skin lotion at 10 times the price.
customer_reviews.text: I guess based upon the reviews, I was hoping for a bit more from this product especially at this price. It does appear that it will last a while since it doesn't take much to coat my beard. My beard is fairly short also. It does soften my beard a bit more than just rubbing a heavy duty lotion into my beard/face (I was previously using a Vaseline Intensive Care Advanced Healing lotion). The irritation of my face from the ends of my beard whiskers is not improved by the beard balm as compared to the lotion I was using. Darn those gray hairs! My beard used to be so soft that I never worried about such things....
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the beard lover!
customer_reviews.text: This beard balm came as a recommendation from another bearded friend. He swore by it so I had to give a try. I can tell you that his made a world of difference. The Honest Amish Beard Balm not only conditioned the hairs, but it helped soothe my skin. I always shaved my beard down due to constant itching with the growth, but this helped me get through it this time. I can honestly say that this was a game changer. I see no signs of flaking. The itchiness only surfaces if I am having a lazy day and haven't used the balm yet. The bottom line is that I was left with a well groomed beard!
customer_reviews.author: D. Walk II

customer_reviews.title: Honestly Religious Experience for Face/Beard
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of this product. It was a very well priced option that gives my beard a tiny bit of shine with just enough conditioning to help tame my half inch beard. The smell is pleasant, not very strong and fades very quickly. It is a hair greasy on my fingers after application, but I just wash it off with soap and water. I brush it through with a boar bristle beard brush (say that five times fast) from Smooth Viking, which I also love. I will say that it doesn't shape your hair in anyway, seems to be more of a conditioning product, so if that's what you need keep looking. Very good quality product, will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: daveelcapo

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a stocking stuffer years back along with a brush when I grew my beard out. Now that I have a beard again, I have ordered up a new puck. Let ms be the first to say I don't think the smell is close to what some have described. I find it to have an okay smell more like herbal tones. Just a small dab will do you work it in and brush. This time around I didn't have that irritation growing out my beard but last time I did and this product helped. It helps with beard control as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Balm? I don't think so...
customer_reviews.text: This definitely moisturizes your beard and skin beneath. I'd categorize this more as a "dry" oil than a beard balm though. It really doesn't do anything to tame your hairs. Works great in place of beard oil though if you prefer something a little more solid to work with. It does have a faint licorice scent that disapates rather quickly. But I don't mind that scent to begin with it! Wish it lasted a little longer. I'm giving this 3 stars only because a balm is suppose to tame and moisturize. This really only does one of those things well and that's moisturize.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for black men’s beard
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. My beard stays soft for days. I usually rinse it off before bed time but it’s still on the hairs. In the morning I can comb it smoothly but wash your pillow more frequently as the oil will be on it. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd delivery try was the charm.
customer_reviews.text: Update. The carrier must have realized they delivered it to the wrong address at first; as when I checked again moments ago the package was on my front porch. About the product itself...LOVE it. The balm has a slight scent that I love..."masculine smell" not sweet at all, rather earthy, and it brushes-in nicely.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Rotten item
customer_reviews.text: Take a look at the picture, clearly we wouldn’t put in the beard. This appears to be rotten.
customer_reviews.author: sean sullivan

customer_reviews.title: An oily mess
customer_reviews.text: Like many others have mentioned, It just doesn't look or feel right. Mixture of little pieces in a goopy oily mess. This stuff also tends to pretty much melt if you breath on it too heavy, doesn't hold up to ANY kind of temperature fluctuation. It may be natural, but i would not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S Guill

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, great product
customer_reviews.text: Picked up the beard oil along with the beard balm from Honest Amish and they're both top notch. The scent is great and they do a great job of moisturizing my beard and skin. The balm is a lot softer than balms I've used in the past, making it a lot easier to get out of the tin, though subsequently, it's less controlling, so if that's what you are primarily looking for in a balm, this one probably isn't for you. In my case, my beard tends to be pretty tame by the time I'm ready to put balm on it, so this is just fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Makes Beard Manageable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this, but my first time in this smaller tin. I assume that the texture on the larger tin was defective because the texture of this one is very smooth and not gritty at all. I've used a couple different balms and oils, but this brand is my favorite. I really enjoy how soft it makes my beard. Completely changes the texture of the hair and makes it significantly more manageable. I still get rogue hairs, but it definitely helps make them easier to tame
customer_reviews.author: Tony DiGiorgio

customer_reviews.title: I like it on the whole — but don't expect miracles
customer_reviews.text: I like it on the whole — but don't expect miracles. It makes your beard feel nice for a couple hours but it's debatable as to whether or not it actually has lasting beneficial effects on your beard. The aroma is nice, though — sort of like a blend of menthol and a woodsy type aroma. Oh, and I can confirm that it has not turned me Amish. It's been about a month or so and I'm still using computers, so there is that.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: An Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: So, I initially got this product because 2 or 3 websites on beard care suggested it. A little bit of this product goes a LONG way! Also, as the packaging says, it might be runny when it first arrives. I froze it in my freezer to quickly harden the product, but you can also use your refrigerator. At room temperature, it becomes a very soft cream. It does have a very greasy feeling when using it. However, it absorbs into your beard quickly and thoroughly when applied directly after showering (a tip I got off of one of those previously mentioned websites).
customer_reviews.author: Monte K

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Needed a product that could help out with my beard. Its a bit rough and course from growing out. Found this product online here and decided to give it a shot. Small container but a little bit goes a long way. It takes a little getting used to but it's worth the effort. Smells good and easy to apply. A little bit on your fingers and then stroke it through the beard. Absorbs quickly and no greasy residue on your hair or fingers. Will continue to use the product.
customer_reviews.author: John Blue

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and correct level of moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Feels very good quality - All natural ingredients - i feel safe to use it - Easy to spread this around - i also have the heavy duty balm from Amish. That one was a bit difficult to spread - Greasiness level is just right - leaves very little greasiness after rubbing in and is greasy enough to provide good moisturizing - I feel a distinct softness in my beard hair soon after applying it. I can feel my beard well nourished & healthy with it. Cons - Nothing to note really, except its scent could be better for me, though it is still quite fine.
customer_reviews.author: Gokul

customer_reviews.title: The hold is not so good like other brands i tried and it did not help groom my stubble beard
customer_reviews.text: I was using a different brand beard balm before that i buy from local departmental store and wanted to give this a try because of the good reviews. But i am sorry to say i did not like this product because of 3 main reasons: 1. The conditioner is very creamy- i expected it to be more thick and medium to firm hold 2. After i applied it on my stubble, i was not able to comb down my hair 3. It smells odd... i dont know if that's case with the one i received or it is like that?? Overall may end up returning it!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: This product smells great and best of all
customer_reviews.text: You will not regret buying this product! Some reviews mentioned the "bad smell' - I'm not sure what they are talking about! This product smells great and best of all, it works great! I was using another well known name brand product that was hard to get out of the container (had to use the the backside of my thumbnail) - not with this product! It comes out smooth and applies with ease! I'm a customer as long as they continue to make and sell this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M.White

customer_reviews.title: Provides a shine, but leaves flaky residue
customer_reviews.text: Been using this beard balm about 2 times a week on my beard for the last 8 months or so. I really wanted to like this product, but overall it's not great. The licorice smell is fine and a little bit goes a long way. This balm provides a nice shine and a nice smell and I find myself picking at my beard less. However, I have not noticed a decrease in the number of split ends and the balm leaves a flaky residue when it dries (and I only add a small amount). It's nice to add a shine but don't expect it to hold your beard in place.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I'm starting to see the benefits
customer_reviews.text: For me, all this product did was make my beard greasy. It wasn't softened or easier to manage. Now when I touch my beard I have to wash my hands every time. Now my pillow smells like clover and ehh, I don't really like that. This is only day one, so maybe it takes a while to work? EDIT: After a few days, I can say that my beard feels healthier and is keeping a better shape. I added another star, will post back after another week
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff But Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Read the ingredients label - sheesh! I have a rather wiry beard and this stuff softened it up nicely. I am happy with the results. Only gripe is price. I think $12 is a bit over the top. Maybe $8, or better $6. A little goes a long way but still feel a bit of a rube. Mine was a little bit weird in the can so I left in the sun upright then popped in fridge. All good.
customer_reviews.author: jacoltrane

customer_reviews.title: Better than oil imo!
customer_reviews.text: I was using beard oil until a buddy of mine let me used some of his balm. It wasn't Honest Amish, but since I was an Honest Amish beard oil subscriber I just switched to the balm. I really like it. It is very easy to apply and brushes right in. I wish I could get it in a larger size though.
customer_reviews.author: kaiseristhereason

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is a nice product, however for me it is a quality issue. The product was received as liquefied. When returning to a solid it is now a gritty mess and is unusable,leaving solids in the beard. I will not be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Softens a wiry beard
customer_reviews.text: I grow a chin beard. When i started it was always dry & wiry. I tried my wife's hair conditioner & that didn't really help. I did some research & found this beard balm. After the first application I noticed a definite softening of the hairs. There is a strong smell (mostly clove) when it's first applied, but that dissipates in about 10-15 minutes (I still smell a faint aroma for about an hour, but I have a sensitive nose). I've been using this product for about a year now & wouldn't use anything else. Try their beard soap. It works great!!
customer_reviews.author: S Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Arrived melted and grainy but still love it
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for about 2+ yrs now. Last one I received arrived looking weird. It was melted and grainy looking with parts of it having some beads in it. Looks like this has happened to others as well. Still giving it 5 stars because I love the product and it works wonders on my beard. I returned it for a replacement so hopefully the new one arrives pasty like previous ones.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS! GET THIS!!  GET THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'd only used oils and conditioners on my beard (African American), and never got the results I wanted. None did a thing, and all were a waste off money. I'd seen this product, liked three oil, but wrongly assumed it wouldn't work for my beard. WRONG!!! This product is GREAT and I can't say much more than that. I used it after using the oil The combination had my beard looking and feeling great instantly. After several days, I can't believe the difference. This stuff is beyond words.
customer_reviews.author: JWalt

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what is up with this latest batch, but it us much chunkier than usual. It takes a lot longer to melt the thick beads and is often clumpy in my beard. I haven't had this problem in the past and I'm hoping it was a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: PackerJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: This beard balm works well, but not better than other brands. It moisturizes the beard and skin as well as holding “fly away” hair. It is more expensive than other brands. The scent is very subtle, which some may like. I prefer a stronger scent. When the package arrived the balm had liquidized. I had to put it into the fridge to get it to solidify and then it was grainy. Just not one of my favorites. Only way I’d give it a second try is if the price dropped.
customer_reviews.author: L Boettcher

customer_reviews.title: High quality beard balm
customer_reviews.text: One of the best beard balms on the market. You only need a couple of penny sized finger full, so it goes a long way, and on the site they even recommend using every other day instead of every day. I use it on my damp beard after coming out of the shower. Scent is neutral to me, some may like it more than others, but either way it’s barely noticeable that it even has a scent.
customer_reviews.author: @ChrisRaybon

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: My husband says this stuff definitely makes a difference. He’s been using it since Christmas and this is the longest he has been able to keep a longer length beard because of the effects of this stuff. Very happy with it. He did say it applies better if his beard is already damp. (The directions may already say to do that, not sure) it’s a pretty small tin for the money but a little goes a long way and it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: WOW, sold me on it.
customer_reviews.text: First, it melts on your finger or in your palm. That's how you apply it. And it doesn't take much at all! The scent is light and very nice. It really does make my beard have shine that isn't greasy, and feels like it's got a bit more body. I'm really impressed. I use other beard moisturizers but I think I might stick with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Heard Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product based off the all of the reviews, thought it must be a great product! I do enjoy this product, not sure how much it actually helps to fill in my beard. To be honest, I thought that I would get a little more for the money but we shall see how long it will last. I will update this review as I see more effects from the product
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.  Negative comments are unfounded.
customer_reviews.text: I've seen a few negative comments about the smell of this stuff. Trust me, its nothing to concern yourself over. Its very subtle, and what you CAN smell, smells great, sorta like a mild, spicy after shave. It will NOT repel the ladies (or dudes, if you're into that) who might want to snuggle that beard. As for how it WORKS, I've only been using for a few days, but it already seems to be tackling that dreaded "Beard Dandruff" problem and has made the beard softer and more manageable. Gotta love the Amish!
customer_reviews.author: Subie

customer_reviews.title: Burns skin..allergic reaction?!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband, he has tried it 2x, burns his skin and causes a headache. Looked online to see ingredients list but could not find in description?!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: Clean face and ladies love it!
customer_reviews.text: I found this beard balm after looking for something to help with beard-druff (flaky skin) from my face, before using this balm when I ran my fingers through my beard a small dust cloud of skin would float away. I applied this beard balm after every shower to my slightly damp beard and within days all beard-druff was completely gone! The scent is nice without being too much and all the ladies now compliment my devilishly handsome red beard. I've never had so many comments from strangers on the quality and shine of my beard since I've been using this beard balm, and it can also be used in other places too ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells great and seems to keep my beard and face well moisturized. I usually use this in the morning as I'm headed out to work and I'll use the Honest Amish beard oil before I head to bed. Both have the same scent, but this one has more conditioners in it and seems to help keep my beard from getting unruly throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler A.

customer_reviews.title: Good product... Jury is still out.
customer_reviews.text: As with any product like this, time will ultimately be the deciding factor. However, the product so far, has been good. It is more like butter and when worked into hands becomes like an oil. Compared to products I've used previous, this is a big difference. I can immediately see & feel the moisturizing difference. I have used Seven Potions previously, which is a great product too.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Honest Amish Beard Balm Leave-in Conditioner is amazing!!! It is very highly absorbent on skin
customer_reviews.text: When the tin of Honest Amish Beard Balm , I was a bit disappointed at first sight. I had expected it to be a larger tin which might last longer. Anyways, I opened the tin and saw the balm which was part- suspension which was rich , dense and aromatic. I had never seen any thing like it. I dipped my finger in the tin and rubbed it gently on my medium size beard, It took one finger dip to cover ALL of the medium beard.... "Honest Amish, Sir, you have a really good product.
customer_reviews.author: TIMOTHY L.

customer_reviews.title: Softens the hair
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a thick, full beard and has been interested in all the products for styling and managing. He bought this balm, an oil, and a wooden comb - all from honest Amish. He loves them. They definitely help keep his beard soft. The scent is only okay to me, but he likes it. He hasn’t noticed any negative effects to his skin or hair. His beard is kind of curly/kinky and this helps to relax it a bit when he combs it out.
customer_reviews.author: Let Me Help

customer_reviews.title: A Beard Softer Than Kittens
customer_reviews.text: BLUF: A simple, honestly good beard balm that will soften your beard Pros: - Travels well - Easy to apply - smells great - actually works as advrtised Cons: - hard to warm up to apply in cold weather....very hard - some may dislike the smell, it does go away Verdict: While you might not gain the powers to raise a barn or master buggy driving, your beard will be soft and supple.
customer_reviews.author: Minimalist Guy

customer_reviews.title: Balm?  More like Beads.
customer_reviews.text: Received product and it was all beaded up in tiny white beads. Looked like a tin of white caviar. The beads do dissolve, eventually, but I wanted a balm, not a bunch of beads that I have to painstakingly dissolve in my fingers before applying. I contacted the Honest Amish, who basically stated that the beads dissolve and that the instructions indicate this. If you want beard beads, then order this product. If you want a balm, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Third order, great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Having tried both the heavy duty versions, I like the regular version better There nothing wrong with the heavy duty version, it just isn't right for my beard The regular is softer, oilier, creamer, and has a light herbal odor. It leaves the beard soft and silky. The heavy duty is stiff and waxy, and wous be good for training and styling. It has a slight wintergreen odor.
customer_reviews.author: The Fat Man

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purchase... will purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Came slightly solidified, but a quick heating and cooling solved it. Works great for managing beards. Without this product my beard would still look like a middle-schoolers failed attempt at masculinity. A must for the grizzly man. Don't worry women - this product believes in equality and will do wonders for your beards as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jin Eric

customer_reviews.title: TEABAG SCENT
customer_reviews.text: Bought it ‘cause someone mentioned that is has a wonderful scent. But it literally smells like if I was carrying a teabag in my beard. No pleasant. The little brush is ok for small beards and fits in your pocket. Advice... make the same tiny brush in a different Material (maybe brushed aluminum or brushed gold alum) with a tiny cover On the brizzle side for man to carry in pocket, AND add a fresh, subtle scent to it. Not chamomile and paprika scent as this one smells.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Honestly Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using one container of this since I ordered it in 2014. Granted I only grow out my beard for 3-4 months out of the year and only ever use a very tiny amount of this, I still have about 1/3 of this left. The scent is great and it makes my beard feel soft all day long! Do your beard an honest favor and pick up some of this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: balm clots, bad quality, bad smell.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend this product.. The smell is not as good as the reviews state, both in strength as well as the actual smell. The moisturizing and beard shaping capacity of the product is average. AND most importantly, the ingredient quality is super poor.. The first week everything was ok, but after that, the balm formed clots, which are horrible to distribute in the beard.. If you dig through the layer of clots, the original balm fabric can still be found below, but with the clots on top, it's challenging to use.. The clots cannot be easily flattened out so some clots will definitely end up in your beard... I will not purchase this product again...
customer_reviews.author: Liquid_Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Did not help dry skin under beard
customer_reviews.text: Positives -Does not leave my beard looking oily. -It has a subtle smell. The smell is not noticeable after a little while. I found the smell to be pleasant but others might not like it. -The consistency is even. After rubbing the balm in your hands, it turns to oil and can be easily applied to your beard. -My beard feels a little softer and less itchy. -Natural ingredients. Negatives -It did not resolve the dandruff and dry skin under my beard. This is the main reason I made the purchase and why I'm removing two stars. Other people seem to have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had a beard as long as I can remember.
customer_reviews.text: I grew a beard every summer while in high school starting at 14 y/o. I kept it after graduating. It is my identity. My wife and seven children have not seen me face. About three years ago I noticed it was not as healthy as before. One day I saw a YouTube video on beard are and they were talking about this stuff. I bought it and fell in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: David W Johnson Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have a short beard, and before I started using this I experienced itchiness and flakiness from dry skin under my beard. I've been using this product for nearly a year now, and it not only has it helped to solve the flakiness, but it has also made my beard softer and (I feel) more visually attractive. The scent is pleasing as well, but fades quickly, which I prefer because it doesn't interfere with my fragrances.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this stuff for a couple months, and I just keep coming on Amazon browsing for another product. It’s basically an applesauce-like paste that you rub into your beard. It certainly helps moisturize your beard and the skin under it, but the smell is quite unpleasant and the greasy residue prevents me from putting it on after my shower (before bed) so it doesn’t stain my pillowcase.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not the normal Amish balm I am used to
customer_reviews.text: So this beard balm is normally awesome. Great smell and awesome for the beard. This time, it sucked. The balm sat in a hot amazon truck which turned the balm into liquid. When I opened it, the liquified balm spilled everywhere. It is not supposed to be liquid. When the balm solidified, it caused it to turn into some type of gritty mess. You can see from the picture how it turned out. Weird. So in essence this balm sucked.
customer_reviews.author: Quiroz

customer_reviews.title: Wax separated and reconstituted in tiny balls.
customer_reviews.text: it looks a little odd when you open it up like the wax separated into little balls. I’ve been trying it on and off for about a month but the wax balls are just annoying. Just now came back to look at reviews and saw similar pictures but also ones where it wasn’t separated. Apparently this isn’t how it is supposed to be. I’m beyond my return period, so probably out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Clint or Mary Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Oaky scent
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this to shape and moisturize my quarantine build and so far it's been all right. It kind of has a oaky-woodsman type scent and a little goes a long way. It has the consistency of vaseline mixed with lip balm and does a good job of keeping my facial hair conditioned. My only gripe is that I wish they had more scents.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan T.

customer_reviews.title: Should have believed the negative reviews
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this product. This is crap. Look at the picture. As one of the previous reviewer said, looks like porridge and drips all over. The picture on amazon is completely different. I tried using it but horrible smell, drips all over and instead of calming my itchiness, increases it. Couldn't sleep the night i used it because of itchiness. Going to trash !
customer_reviews.author: nature admirer

customer_reviews.title: go with the heavy duty balm instead
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews more .. the HEAVY DUTY one is the better one to purchase ..this formula the original have a lumpy texture until u melt it in your hand.. it also looses it's "balm" texture much faster then the heavy duty . It's still ok , but I feel like why have the beard oil and this when u end up with the same oil almost when it melts
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Makes my BF smell delicious
customer_reviews.text: Love the balm, my BF loves the balm...everybody loves the balm. Goes on well, doesn't flake or anything. He smells irresistible after he puts it on and he said he likes the way it makes his beard and skin feel. Doesn't go on too thick or get runny. It's a good product size also, because it's easy to travel with or even keep in his pocket or backpack.
customer_reviews.author: BGR

product_meta.title: Honest Amish Beard Balm Leave-in Conditioner - Made with only Natural and Organic Ingredients - 2 Ounce Tin
product_meta.description: The best for your beard we guarantee it. Honest Amish Beard Balm is created from the finest organic ingredients available. We start with a proprietary blend of hair strengthening botanical infused in a base of Virgin Argan, Avocado, Almond, Virgin Pumpkin Seed, and Apricot Kernel Oils. It is then masterfully crafted with fruit and nut butters (Shea, Aloe, Cocoa, Kokum, to name a few), and hair enhancing essential oils. Subtle scents of Cedarwood, Anise (licorice), and Clove. We recommend that people with nut allergies avoid this product or test a small amount before application. Honest Amish Beard Balm will help soften, condition, dry splitting hairs, and nourish new growth. Our balm is also very conditioning for your skin and will stop the itching caused by new growth and wild rogue hairs. Due to the use of only natural ingredients in our beard balm, separation of the product may occur when exposed to fluctuations in temperature. The beard balm will continue to work as normal; it will just require a few extra seconds of manipulation when melting in your hands. However, to return it back to a smooth consistency it can be melted back down by placing the beard balm in a warm place (direct sun light, in car, heater vent, etc. Do not use open flames, microwaves, or stove tops) Once melted, secure the lid on your beard balm and shake it up, mixing up all the oils. Then allow to cool to room temperature or place in refrigerator for faster solidification. Beard Balm may liquefy in transit USE CAUTION WHEN OPENING. We use absolutely NO man made chemicals or preservatives and NO fake fragrances or colorants in any of our products. Packaged in a 100 percent recyclable tin. Made in The U.S.A. by hand for an honest wage. If you are not 100 percent satisfied with your purchase for any reason, please return it for a full refund.
